title: Can someone use your number to text on someone else's phone? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's highly unlikely without your permission most applications that use the call forwarding feature they would send a verification number to your phone and then you would have to give that verification number the other phone that would be using your number so absent that it's highly unlikely that they could text with your number. But they can spoof a phone call with your number but using caller ID faker but that would not include text messaging
